title: WTB/WTTF T206 Mathewson Black Cap VG or Less condition
author: uyu906

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF T206 Mathewson Black Cap VG or Less condition
posts.post_content:
Looking for T206 Christy Mathewson black cap.  I need it in VG or less condition, graded or raw.  Back damage is not as important to me as a nice clean front of the card.  No creases through Matty's face or head either.

Please let me know what you have and what your best price is.

Thanks,
Rich
There's a nice, albeit not centered well, PSA 4 Dark Cap on Huggins Scott ending tonight
